 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָכַךְ‎</span>] **verb** ==be tender, weak, soft== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְכַךְ‎</span> (in derived species and derivatives), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***id.***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַךְ‎</span> [[2Kgs.22.19|2Kgs 22:19]]; [[2Chr.34.27|2Chr 34:27]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַכּוּ‎</span> [[Ps.55.22|Ps 55:22]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵרַךְ‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67p»§ 67p</sup>) [[Isa.7.4|Isa 7:4]] +; — 

**1.** ***be tender, weak***, of heart : 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***be timid, fearful***, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַרֵא‎</span>, [[Isa.7.4|Isa 7:4]]; [[Jer.51.46|Jer 51:46]]; [[Deut.20.3|Deut 20:3]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** be ***softened, penitent***, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּנַע‎</span> Niph\`al, [[2Kgs.22.19|2Kgs 22:19]] = [[2Chr.34.27|2Chr 34:27]]. 

**2.** be soft, of treacherous words [[Ps.55.22|Ps 55:22]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> compare; \|\| II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָלַק‎</span>). **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֻכְּכָה‎</span> [[Isa.1.6|Isa 1:6]] ***it has*** not ***been softened***, mollified, with oil (of wound, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַכָּךְ‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאֵל הֵרַךְ לִבִּי‎</span> [[Job.23.16|Job 23:16]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67v»§ 67v</sup>), causative of **Qal 1 a**.
